## Latin Squares

```{r}
library(minionator)

a <- LatinSquare$new(3)
print(a)
```

```{r}
library(rminion)

Sys.setenv("PATH" = paste("/home/matthew/bin/minion-1.8/bin", Sys.getenv("PATH"), sep = ":"))

minion(a, options = c("findallsols", "noprintsols"))
```

## Enumerate Latin squares of size at most 5

c.f. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin_square

```{r}
latin_count <- function(n) minion(LatinSquare$new(n), options = c("findallsols", "noprintsols"))

counts <- purrr::map_df(1:5, latin_count)
knitr::kable(counts)
```
